pages.text: Once you've created your source steel, utilize your enchanting apparatus to improve your tools.
Source Steel tools apply free buffs to the spells relevant to their role.
The Source Steel Axe benefits spells like Fell and Cut, with a lesser benefit to any other spells. [Touch Spells]
The Source Steel Pickaxe benefits spells like Break and Crush, with a lesser benefit to any other spells. [Touch Spells]
